description: Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of the site to provide a mixed use development in three separate buildings varying from 1- 6 storeys in height to provide a 4860m² Leisure Centre (Use Class D2) containing a swimming pool, sports hall, fitness suites, community rooms, health suite and crèche, 247m² of workshop space (Use Class B1) and 63 residential units with 4 parking spaces with access onto Clapham Manor Street and associated landscaping, amenity space and servicing.
